messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Captain here, I'm not going to make any pretenses here. Most of you don't know what you are doing, so we're going to follow some very simple steps to help you all along. Call out over the radio with the number one (1), if you are new to Space Station 13. Call over the radio with number two (2) if you know what you are doing. You can speak on the radio by typing say "; Hello" into your chat bar. The semi-colon (;) is needed to speak on the radio. I'm going to be showing you how to do most of the things on the station, just ask me for help.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
